p: Tackling with environmental risk factors always entails intersectoral collaborations and a One Health approach. Research inputs from both human and animal health sides, including many other scientific and non-scientific stakeholders, will be needed to facilitate a systemic way to effectively deal with COVID-19 emergency. A One Health perspective is foreseen, especially in the Global South, to design and implement research programs and policies in which multiple sectors communicate and work together to achieve better public health outcomes.
